snippet: Remarks by Mitt Romney that enraged Palestinians were based on the writings of a top adviser, Dan Senor.
abstract: Top Mitt Romney adviser Dan Senor has become one of the key people shaping the candidate's increasingly hawkish views on the Middle East; Romney's comments on Israeli culture and on Israel's right to pre-emptively strike Iran's nuclear facilities, which enraged many Palestinians, were informed by Senor's writings.

byline.contributor: Michael Barbaro and Richard A. Oppel Jr. contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Remarks by Mitt Romney that enraged Palestinians were based on the writings of a top adviser, Dan Senor.

headline.seo: Senor Draws Attention as Romney Adviser
headline.main: Adviser Draws Attention to Romney Mideast Policy
headline.print_headline: Adviser Draws Attention to Romney Mideast Policy
